test.query: WITH number AS x SELECT sum(x < 1 ? 1 : (x < 5 ? 2 : 3)) FROM numbers(1000000)
WITH number AS x SELECT any(x < 1 ? '1' : (x < 5 ? '2' : '3')) FROM numbers(1000000)
WITH number AS x SELECT sum(x < 1 ? 1 : (x < 5 ? 2 : (x < 10 ? 3 : (x % 2 ? 4 : 5)))) FROM numbers(1000000)
WITH number AS x SELECT any(x < 1 ? '1' : (x < 5 ? '2' : (x < 10 ? '3' : (x % 2 ? '4' : '5')))) FROM numbers(1000000)
